title: [Dubbo-6887] Fix the consumer accidentally using FixedThreadPool, resulting in threads starting with Dubbo-thread-xxx prefix
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/6887

## Brief changelog

There are many threads named with Dubbo-thread-xxx on the consumer side，these threads will not be recycled.
(中文：消费方出现了很多以Dubbo-thread-xxx命名的线程，这些线程不会被回收)

## Verifying this change

消费方感知到提供方下线或者禁用

AllChannelHandler#disconnected -> getExecutorService() -> getSharedExecutorService()
-> DefaultExecutorRepository#getExecutor -> 此时消费方关联线程池已关闭(executor.isShutdown() || executor.isTerminated()) -> createExecutor(url)

上面的URL并不存在threadname、threadpool参数，导致消费方创建了FixedThreadPool线程池

title: 修复客户端混合使用注解方式及xml方式时，consumer标签配置registry属性时注解方式订阅服务无法识别注册中心的问题
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

修复客户端混合使用注解方式及xml方式时，在xml中consumer标签下配置registry属性时，注解方式订阅服务无法识别注册中心的问题

## Brief changelog

在ReferenceConfig类的init方法中获取是否使用consumer配置的registry时，增加判断前置已获取的registries数组大小为0

## Verifying this change

1，xml中配置若干条dubbo registry，同时指定consumer的registry为其中1个
<dubbo:registry id="r1" ...../>
<dubbo:registry id="r2" ...../>
<dubbo:consumer registry="r1"/>
2，通过@Reference注解订阅一个服务
3，本代码修改前服务订阅异常。修改后服务能正常订阅

title: [Dubbo-6739]fix NullPointerException caused by setting error protocol to consumer registry url
body:
## What is the purpose of the change
to fix #6739 
Consumer set error protocol "consumer", it should be "dubbo", that cause a NullPointerException when get a provider url from registry.
see: 
```
at org.apache.dubbo.registry.client.InstanceAddressURL.addConsumerParams(InstanceAddressURL.java:284)

public URL addConsumerParams(String protocolServiceKey, Map<String, String> params) {
        getMetadataInfo().getServiceInfo(protocolServiceKey).addConsumerParams(params);
        return this;
    }
```

## Brief changelog

modify 2 same code in 2 classes: 
1. org.apache.dubbo.registry.client.RegistryProtocol
2. org.apache.dubbo.registry.integration.InterfaceCompatibleRegistryProtocol

Original code:
`URL urlToRegistry = new URL(CONSUMER_PROTOCOL, parameters.remove(REGISTER_IP_KEY), 0, type.getName(), parameters);`
CONSUMER_PROTOCOL is `consumer`

After modified code:
`URL urlToRegistry = new URL(DEFAULT_REGISTRY, parameters.remove(REGISTER_IP_KEY), 0, type.getName(), parameters);`
DEFAULT_REGISTRY is `dubbo`

## Verifying this change

title: [Dubbo-6379]. Merge stacktrace of consumer-side and server-side in while exceptoin happened in server-side.
body:
fix #6379. While exception happened in server-side, make stacktrace of consumer-side can be tracked.

## What is the purpose of the change

Track the stacktrace of consumer-side while exception happened in server-side.

## Brief changelog  
Merge stacktrace of consumer side and provider side, and fill the stacktrace in deserialized exception, which may not be elegent.  
I've try to wrap server-side's exception with RpcException, in that way strack trace is more clearly, but the side effect is `catch(MyException e)`  may not work as expected. If there is any better way, the pr can be closed.


## Verifying this change
throw an exception in server-side, throw or log the excetion in consumer-side, from the stacktrace we can see where we invoke the remote method .
